description: not working, not working, not working, not working,

Nice to have the date and time on the screen but the only way I can make this display my time correctly on all three of my linux machines is to set my timezone to Gurnsey even though I am in Ireland. If I set it to local or Dublin my clock is two hours behind. The strangest thing is if I set it to London / GMT the clock is only an hour behind?? Ireland uses GMT so there is something wrong there.
summary: Useful but wrong time for me

description: Works fine on Kubuntu 21.10. Need to figure out how to launch it automatically.
Cuando lanzo la aplicación se abren otras dos diferentes: Actividad del sistema y Visor de tipos de letras.
